main_definition: Baghdad is the capital city of Iraq, often used as a metaphor or in idiomatic expressions to represent various concepts.

meanings_and_examples.example: The ancient trade routes passed through Baghdad.
The conflict in Baghdad has global implications due to its strategic importance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describing the historical significance of the city during the Islamic Golden Age
meanings_and_examples.example: Baghdad was a center for scholarship, science, and culture during the Abbasid Caliphate.
The situation in Baghdad has become very unstable recently.
